page.title: 16CAPENHURST-LOCAL PEOPLE.
page.content: Mr.J.Wilson,a Parish Councillor for 25 years,deals with local concerns and helps the community run smoothly.Items discussed in Council include provision of parking at the Village Hall,street lighting,speed restrictions,flooding of the roads,litter & house building applications.Sometimes seemingly good ideas may not be financially viable or not in the locality's best interests. Eg.a bus service arranged but then not used & a play area,under consideration might attract outsiders & vandals.He's a local organiser for the National Farmers' Union & has been a Governor of the village school for 15 years.Of all these voluntary jobs the latter is his favourite as he attended it as a child & loves helping children.He says If you want to do something & feel it will help people,you can always find the time.
